Armour.Name: Cloak of Whispering Shadows
Armour.Description: A cloak that seems to absorb light, enhancing the wearer's stealth abilities.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Allows the wearer to blend into the shadows, greatly reducing enemy detection.

Armour.Name: Boots of Silent Steps
Armour.Description: These boots make no sound, regardless of the surface they tread upon.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Increases movement speed silently, perfect for stealth missions.

Armour.Name: Mask of the Night Seer
Armour.Description: A mask that grants its wearer the ability to see clearly in complete darkness.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Grants night vision, revealing hidden traps and enemies in the dark.
